vehicles.description: There is a yellow car ahead on the right side of the ego car, half into the lane of the ego car and half in the parking zone.
vehicles.explanation: The positioning of the yellow car affects the driving path of the ego car and may require the ego car to change lanes or slow down to avoid a collision.

other objects.description: A large blue billboard is partially obstructing the view ahead on the right side. It appears to be close to or partially on the road.
other objects.explanation: This object reduces the visibility of the road and any other road users that might emerge from the right, increasing the risk to the safety of the ego car.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is a yellow car ahead on the right side of the ego vehicle. The yellow car is positioned in a way that it is half into the lane of the ego car and half in the parking zone. The location of the yellow car is significant as it affects the driving path of the ego car, potentially necessitating a change of lanes or a reduction in speed to prevent a collision.

Additionally, there is a large blue billboard that is partly blocking the view ahead on the right side, which seems to be close to or on the roadway. This billboard poses a hazard because it reduces visibility, concealing any other road users who might be approaching from the right, thereby increasing the risk of an incident involving the ego vehicle.

1.description and explanation: The object is a tricycle, which is a three-wheeled vehicle used often in urban areas for small-scale cargo delivery or personal transport. It is smaller and moves at a slower pace compared to standard four-wheeled vehicles. For future driving behavior of the ego car, awareness of such tricycles is essential as they can affect the traffic flow and require careful overtaking maneuvers due to their slower speed and potential unpredictability in movement.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should proceed with caution, maintain a lower speed to handle sudden changes, and be prepared to maneuver around the yellow car and the large billboard on the right side. Due to reduced visibility and road blockages, readiness to stop or change lanes quickly is crucial.
